trends: There has been one other sighting in Revere
There were no other sightings in Revere on or around December 14th 2002
divs: Sighting Detailsas i was outside i was ready to leave as i saw something that looked like abunch of ballons as i watched them i saw they were staying together in a groupand not moveing away from each other, this lasted for about a 12hr as i saw myneighbor that is a police officer pull up i asked him to look at it as well andi even called my city police to see if there was any militay flying going on orthe local airport reporting any thing. this is not the first time i have seenanything strange like this, i grew up in NM and saw something there that waseven stranger but being a kid at the time i called my mom out to look at it andshe saw it as well. and i do have some marks on my leg and arm that i have noclue where they came from
